text: Janet Vera Street-Porter (n√©e Bull; born 27 December 1946) is an English broadcaster, journalist, writer, and media personality. She is currently an anchor on ITV's lunchtime chat show Loose Women. Street-Porter was appointed a Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in the 2016 Birthday Honours for services to journalism and broadcasting. ==References== Category:Living people Category:English journalists Category:1946 births
title: Janet Street-Porter
